SELECT COLUMN_NAME, ORDINAL_POSITION, DATA_TYPE_SQL(??, ??, ?, ORDINAL_POSITION) COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = ?? AND TABLE_NAME = ??
SELECT SEQUENCE_NAME, BASE_VALUE, INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SEQUENCES ORDER BY SEQUENCE_NAME
SELECT USER_NAME, IS_ADMIN FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.USERS ORDER BY USER_NAME
SELECT VIEW_DEFINITION FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = ? AND TABLE_NAME = ?
